DOC.brief_title: S0348 Vaccine Therapy Treating Patients With Stage IIIB Stage IV Breast Cancer Remission
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine feasibility conduct live viral vaccine trial use adjuvant recombinant modify vaccinia Ankara-5T4 vaccine ( TroVax® ) patient stage IIIB-IV breast cancer remission . - Determine progression-free survival patient treat vaccine . - Determine 5T4-specific T-cell immune response patient treat vaccine . - Determine toxicity vaccine patient . - Determine level 5T4-specific antibody response patient treat vaccine . - Correlate , preliminarily , immune response 3- 12-month progression-free survival patient treat vaccine . - Correlate tumor 5T4 expression overall survival progression-free survival patient treat vaccine . - Correlate tumor infiltrate lymphocyte CD1a-positive dendritic cell density development 5T4-specific T-cell immunity patient treated vaccine . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive recombinant modify vaccinia Ankara-5T4 vaccine ( TroVax® ) intramuscularly month month 1-3 . Patients receive booster vaccination month 6 , 9 , 12 . Treatment continue absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . After completion study treatment , patient follow every 6 month 2 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 120 patient accrue study within 2 year .
